sentence.Network_en: Eurasian herb with white or pinkish flowers in a terminal corymb.
sentence.Network_cn: 欧亚草本植物,伞房花序末端开白色或淡紫色花.

PerfectNetExp.abs: ...雌花），花无花被或有花被，花序，下垂或直立，开花后常整个一起脱落。如杨、柳的花序；栎、榛等的雄花序。, 4、伞房花序(corymb), 或称平顶总状花序，是变形的总状花序，不同于总状花序之处在于上各花花柄的长短不一，下部花花柄最长，愈近.
合包囊_互动百科 ... Corydon 青年 corymb 伞状花序 corymbate 具伞房花序的.

list.abs: Inflorescence a corymb or a raceme , terminal , to more than 10 - flowered., 花序一伞房花序或总状花序 , 顶生 , 到多于 10 花.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 18th cent.: from French corymbe or Latin corymbus, from Greek korumbos 'cluster'

means.word_mean: 1. flat-topped or convex inflorescence in which the individual flower stalks grow upward from various points on the main stem to approximately the same height; outer flowers open first
